ThingDef.label: hyper-linkage chip (tier 4)
ThingDef.description: A beamcasting-band synchronization micro-organ. It is necessary to produce certain advanced types of mechanoids and equipment.\n\nA mechanitor can study this chip to help unlock higher tiers of mechtech research. Dropped by the Infernus.

ThingDef.label: stellar processing chip (tier 5)
ThingDef.description: A voidlink-focusing mechanoid micro-organ. It is necessary to produce certain advanced types of mechanoids and equipment.\n\nA mechanitor can study this chip to help unlock higher tiers of mechtech research. Dropped by the War Empress.

ThingDef.label: quantum matrix chip (tier 6)
ThingDef.description: A quantum-restructing mechanoid micro-organ. It is necessary to produce certain advanced mechanoids and equipment.\n\nA mechanitor can study this chip to help unlock higher tiers of mechtech research. Dropped by the Apoptosis.
